title: Doc update v1.6.3.5-v9
details:
Updated all Copilot documentation files for v1.6.3.5-v9 release on 2024-12-04.

Key changes documented:
1. `__quickTabWindow` property on container for reverse instance lookup
2. `data-quicktab-id` attribute for DOM querying
3. `DragController.updateElement()` method for re-render handling
4. `_removeListeners()` helper extracted in DragController
5. Reflow forcing via `container.offsetHeight` in `_applyZIndexAfterRestore()`

Files updated:
- .github/copilot-instructions.md (14.9KB)
- All 13 agent files in .github/agents/

All files verified under 15KB limit.
